p: Bacterial diversity, including a rarefaction analysis, richness estimators (Chao 1 and ACE), and diversity indices (Shannon and Simpson) were calculated using MOTHUR software (version 1.35.1, http://www.mothur.org), according to previous instructions [ 30]. The principal coordinate analysis (PCoA) was performed based on the Brayâˆ’Curtis distance, and analysis of molecular variance (AMOVA) was performed to compare the dissimilarities among the specimens [ 30].
